metadata.title: Sony A7IV vs A7C 2025: Best Sony Camera for YouTube
metadata.description: Compare Sony A7IV and A7C for YouTube. Which full-frame mirrorless is right for your content?

hero.headline: Sony A7IV vs A7C
hero.subheadline: Two excellent full-frame options. Different priorities for different creators.

sections.content: Sony's A7IV and A7C are both popular choices for YouTube creators wanting full-frame quality. The A7IV offers more features and resolution. The A7C prioritizes compactness and portability. Both shoot excellent video—here's how to choose.

content.title: Better Video Specs
content.description: 4K60, 10-bit, better codecs. More professional video output.

content.title: Compact Size
content.description: Much smaller body. Full-frame in near-APS-C size.

content.title: Lower Price
content.description: $700+ savings. Money for lenses or accessories.

content.title: Portability
content.description: Travel and vlog-friendly. Less intimidating for subjects.

faq.question: Which has better autofocus?
faq.answer: A7IV has newer generation AF with improved subject tracking. Both are excellent. Difference noticeable mainly in challenging conditions.

faq.question: Is the size difference significant?
faq.answer: Yes. A7C is dramatically smaller and lighter. Feels like different category of camera. A7IV is traditional mirrorless size.

faq.question: Best for YouTube vlogging?
faq.answer: A7C for handheld vlogging due to size. A7IV for studio/desk setup where features matter more than portability.

faq.question: Will A7C II change this comparison?
faq.answer: A7C II brings newer features to compact body. Check current prices—may affect value proposition of either original model.
